data.title: InterContinental Washington D.C. – The Wharf
data.meta_description: At the heart of D.C.’s Wharf neighborhood, a historic waterfront reimagined for modern luxurious living. A mile of upscale restaurants, unique entertainment…
data.text:
The InterContinental Washington D.C. – The Wharf is at the heart of D.C.’s Wharf neighborhood, a historic waterfront reimagined for modern luxurious living. A mile of upscale restaurants, unique entertainment, and lively public spaces along the scenic Potomac River make the perfect atmosphere for your stay.

Conveniently located seconds away from major thoroughfares, just a few blocks to public transit stops, and a mere five miles from the Reagan National Airport. Getting to The Wharf is easy and effortless, so you can focus on enjoying your stay.
